name: Abandoned Warehouse
description: A cold, empty warehouse where the desperate find shelter from the elements.
initialState: Broken crates and old tarps provide makeshift bedding. Wind whistles through gaps in the walls.

name: Lower Ward Square
description: A small square where the poor gather to share news and seek opportunities.
initialState: Worn cobblestones and a broken fountain. Desperate souls linger in doorways.

name: Martha's Wharf
description: A working wharf where dock workers load and unload river barges for daily wages.
initialState: Stacks of crates and barrels. The smell of tar and river water fills the air.

name: Private Room
description: A discreet meeting room in the Merchant's Rest, reserved for confidential business.
initialState: Well-appointed room with comfortable chairs and thick curtains for privacy.

name: Fishmonger's Stall
description: Frans' fish stall, where fresh catches are sold and dock gossip is traded freely.
initialState: Fish laid out on ice, scales glittering in the light. The sharp smell of brine fills the air.
